ComicInfo.Summary: Doktor Sleepless continues his ranting and radio in this ongoing series from Warren Ellis. It's such a noisy world, isn't it? The cries of the disaffected, the screams of the dying, the complaints of all those previously-cozy folks in Central, and all the mad music that clangs and heralds and sounds a bit like the end of the world. Every day the world gets louder, until it seems like all that's left to do is tune it out. It doesn't seem like anyone's really listening anymore, does it? But if the people of Heavenside aren't listening to the Doktor, they should be - because they don't want to miss what he's going to say next!
ComicInfo.Title: Immanentising the Eschaton
